html: We had two visitors drop by the office today – May Lin and Yao Hsiao from the Taipei Economic and Cultural Representative Office (TECRO). @GreggHarper visited Taiwan on a trip last year & we hope to maintain a strong relationship between our offices with our international partnerpic.twitter.com/818lbzGWPZ

html: Faith & prayer have been the cornerstone of my life as a Christian husband, father, & prosecutor. The decision to join the Congressional Prayer Caucus stems from my own personal belief in the power that prayer can have to shape the future of our nation:https://bit.ly/2TDoAXy

html: Today, I encourage you to take some time to thank a law enforcement officer or first responder for their service to our communities. Across our state, men and women risk their lives to keep us safe – today, we thank them. #NationalLawEnforcementAppreciationDaypic.twitter.com/wfJAzqWYES

html: I joined @HaleyBarbour & @SenatorWicker this morning to speak to a group of Ole Miss students visiting DC through the Barbour Endowment to learn about our government.
